itunes:summary:
Dan Hollaway and New York Times Best Selling Author Steven Kotler discuss psychedelics and flow states in support of unlocking human potential and how they're used in Silicon Valley and the special operations community. The guys also discuss Steven's books Stealing Fire and his latest book The Art of Impossible: A Peak Performance Primer, now available everywhere books and audiobooks are sold. #stevenkotler #stealingfire #flowstate
